p: Chromatographic peak 2 (2.17 min) showed a precursor ion [M − H] − at m/ z 153.0184, with the following composition of C 7H 5O 4 (mass error 0.13 ppm) and a MS2 base peak at m/ z 109.0283, resulting from the removal of a -CO 2 group ( Figure S2b). Assignation to protocatechuic acid was achieved using a commercial standard.
